title: Scutellaria baicalensis Georgi stems and leaves flavonoids promote neuroregeneration and ameliorate memory loss in rats through cAMP-PKA-CREB signaling pathway based on network pharmacology and bioinformatics analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Yinhui Yao, Qianqian Liu, Shengkai Ding, Yan Chen, Tangtang Song, Yazhen Shang
